item.description: Join us to share how you have created change in your life utilizing LOA. Due to the size of the room, we are accepting yes or no responses only. If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Looking forward to seeing everyone. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the private room towards the back.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: LOA P.M. Meetup
